item.title: The Daily Ben — 2026-02-24
item.description: Today’s episode explores the massive $100 billion investment reshaping the AI arms race and the physical infrastructure bottlenecks threatening to slow it down. We also dive into a shifting housing market where buyers are gaining leverage despite a deepening affordability crisis, and examine critical global tensions between the U.S. and Iran. The show concludes with a look at the future of the blues in Chicago through the eyes of a local legend.

item.title: The Daily Ben — 2026-02-24.5
item.description: Explore the high-stakes world of AI as we discuss Anthropic’s public accusations of corporate espionage and the shifting venture capital landscape where investor loyalty is a thing of the past. This episode also dives into the rise of autonomous AI agents—from their potential to go "rogue" in your inbox to new tools that give users an "AI kill switch" for better digital control.
